hero.sub_title: Passion for clinical research and innovation
hero.title: Leader in clinical research in Colombia
list: Over 20 years of experience in clinical research.
Certifications in good clinical practices since 2011 and accreditations demonstrating the quality of our management processes.
Four exclusive research centers with over 300 beds.
Over 100 clinical trials conducted in areas such as vaccines, cardiology, and nephrology.

service_area.section_subtitle: Medical Specialties of Our Research Center
service_area.section_title: Discover our research areas dedicated to improving health and wellbeing.

modal.paragraph1: This study focuses on the latest research and advances in {{title}}. Our team of specialists constantly works to offer innovative solutions and treatments, aiming to improve the quality of life of our patients.
modal.paragraph2: Additionally, we collaborate with various organizations to ensure that every treatment and study meets the highest standards of quality and safety.

slider_items.title: Vaccines
slider_items.des: We develop effective vaccines to protect your health and prevent diseases.

slider_items.title: Cardiology
slider_items.des: We provide precise diagnostics and innovative treatments for heart diseases.

slider_items.title: Rheumatology
slider_items.des: We offer specialized treatments for managing rheumatic diseases.

slider_items.title: Nephrology
slider_items.des: We improve your kidney health through advanced therapies and specialized care.

slider_items.title: Oncology
slider_items.des: We offer advanced and personalized treatments to fight cancer.

slider_items.title: Pulmonology
slider_items.des: Effective treatments to improve the health of your lungs and airways.

slider_items.title: Neurology
slider_items.des: We address disorders of the nervous system with innovative and precise therapies.

slider_items.title: Endocrinology
slider_items.des: We provide comprehensive care for hormonal and metabolic diseases.

slider_items.title: Pediatrics
slider_items.des: We care for your children's health with dedicated research for pediatric wellbeing.

slider_items.title: Immunology
slider_items.des: We investigate the immune system to develop innovative treatments.

slider_items.title: Allergology
slider_items.des: We offer personalized diagnostics and treatments to control your allergies.

slider_items.title: Internal Medicine
slider_items.des: We address a wide range of pathologies with an integral and personalized approach.

slider_items.title: Gastroenterology
slider_items.des: We offer advanced treatments for digestive health and gastrointestinal diseases.

slider_items.title: Infectiology
slider_items.des: We treat and prevent infectious diseases with effective therapies.

about.title: About Us
about.section_title: Clinical Research Center, Leader in the Caribbean Region
about.section_sub_title: The main clinical studies center in the Caribbean Region, with 35 years of experience in advanced medical research.
about.section_des: We conduct over 100 clinical studies and collaborate with renowned global pharmaceutical companies like Pfizer, Sanofi, and Novartis. Our focus is on integral patient care and innovative solutions to improve health and wellbeing across different specialties such as oncology, cardiology, nephrology, and more.

brands.title: Our Sponsors
brands.description: We appreciate the support of our sponsors, who make our research and advancements in healthcare possible.

gallery.subtitle: Our Clinical Research Services
gallery.title: Discover the Specialization Areas of the Costa Clinical Research Center

1.text2: Clinical trials conducted by expert cardiologists at the Costa Clinical Research Center

2.text2: Advanced nephrology research carried out by specialists at the Costa Clinical Research Center

3.text2: Clinical studies in oncology for the development of new cancer treatments

4.text2: Vaccine clinical trials conducted by infectious disease specialists at the Costa Clinical Research Center

5.text2: Advanced neurological research to better understand nervous system diseases

recognitions.title: Recognitions
recognitions.sectionTitle: Recognitions awarded to the research center

textContent.title: MSD
textContent.description: Recognition to the CIC for excellent performance and quality management in clinical study execution. April 2017.

textContent.title: MSD
textContent.description: Recognition to the CIC for its contribution to clinical research during the 75th anniversary commemoration.

textContent.title: November 2022
textContent.description: MSD - Inventing for Life - Awards this recognition to Clínica de La Costa for its contribution to science and innovation in clinical research in Colombia.

textContentRight.title: May 2021
textContentRight.description: MSD - Awards this recognition to Clínica de la Costa for its adaptability and efficiency in administrative and regulatory processes during the pandemic. Bogotá, Colombia.

textContentRight.title: May 9, 2024
textContentRight.description: MSD - Excellent quality metrics during 2023 and the first quarter of 2024. Proudly presented to Clínica de la Costa. This certificate is awarded for honorable achievement.

textContentRight.title: May 2021
textContentRight.description: MSD - Awards this recognition to Clínica de la Costa for the extraordinary efforts made to ensure patient safety and continuity during the pandemic. Bogotá, Colombia.

specialists.footerText: The Clínica de la Costa Research Center is dedicated to developing innovative solutions in key areas such as oncology, cardiology, and nephrology, transforming lives and promoting health through cutting-edge scientific advances.
